title: Aníbal Fernández - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet: He also held the positions of Secretary General of the Presidency, National Senator for the province of Buenos Aires during the period 2013-2015, Minister of the Interior and Minister of Justice, Security and Human Rights between 2002 and 2011, under the orders of three different presidents: ...

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Durante el gobierno del Presidente Duhalde, Fernández fue designado secretario de Gobierno de la Provincia de Buenos Aires, secretario general de la Presidencia y ministro de producción.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: He worked in these roles for more than nine years in total. He was the Minister of Production, Interior Minister, and Minister of Justice. He also served as the President's Cabinet Chief.

title: Buenos Aires Times | Aníbal Fernández: ‘I understand and share the president’s view on re-election’
snippet: Security Minister Aníbal Fernández, who has won the confidence of both Alberto Fernández and Cristina Fernández de Krichner in his lengthy political career occupying posts of key importance in different Peronist governments, gave an interview both before and after the president ended his re-election bid.
